text: Table Tennis is an event at the Island Games, the biennial multi-sports event for island nations, territories and dependencies. Table Tennis was first included in the Island Games in 1987. Table Tennis is not always chosen as a sport in the games. * Men's and Women's Singles - a maximum of 4 competitors per Member Island * Men's and Women's Doubles - a maximum of 2 pairs per Member Island * Mixed Doubles - a maximum of 4 competitors per Member Island * Team per Member Island consisting of: :: Men Maximum of 4 and a minimum of 2 competitors :: Women Maximum of 4 and a minimum of 1 competitor * Age - minimum 13cite web |url=http://www.iiga.org/media//New%20Individual%20By- Laws/Table%20Tennis%20By-laws%20Jan%202015.pdf |title=IIGA bylaws ==Events== As of 2019. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
